lines.gurmukhi: crn kml rj gurisK mwQY lwgI; bwCq skl gurisK pg ryn hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: A Sikh of the Guru who is blessed by the holy dust of the feet of the True Guru (who receives the boon of Naam Simran from the True Guru), the entire Universe crave for the dust of his feet.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: AYsy guxwˆ dy crx kmlwˆ dI rj UlI lgI hY ijhiVAwˆ is`Kwˆ dy m`Qy aupr, sB hI Agy kQn kIqy mMgdy hn, Enwˆ gur is`Kwˆ dy crxwˆ dI ryx DUVI nUM[

lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin koit kmlw klpqr; pwrs AMimRq icMqwmin kwmDyn hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Millions of goddesses of wealth, tree of Indra's heavenly garden (Kalap- Variksh), philosopher stones, elixirs, distress removing forces and heavenly cows (Kamdhenu) desire the touch of such a Sikh of the Guru.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: kRoVwˆ hI kRoVwˆ lCmIAwˆ, klp ibrC, pwrs, AMimRq, icMqwmxIAwˆ qQw jo kwmDynUAwˆ hn[

lines.gurmukhi: suir nr nwQ muin iqRBvn Aau iqRkwl; log byd igAwn aunmwn jyn kyn hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Millions of gods, humans, sages, master yogis, all the three worlds, the three times, wondrous knowledge of Vedas and many such estimates beg for the holy dust of the feet of such a disciple of the Guru.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: qyqI kRoV dyvqy, nr mnu`K nOˆ nwQ, s`q munI, surg, pqwl, mwq lok Aru BUq Biv`Kq vrqmwn kwl, cOdwˆ lok, cwroˆ byd, lOikk byidk igAwn, qQw jyn kyn, ijs iks pRkwr kr ky hor jo kuC BI aunmwn kIqw soc vIcwr ivc lÎwˆdw jw skdw hY ieh sB dy sB hI AnMq guxwˆho ho ky aukq crx DUV dI bwˆCw krdy rihMdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin isK sMgiq AsMK jw kY; nmo nmo gurmuK suKPl dyn hY [193[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: There are numerous congregations of such Sikhs of the True Guru. I bow again and again before such True Guru who is the blesser of such elixir-like Naam that provides comfort and peace. (193)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: kRoVwˆ qoˆ kRoVwˆ hI AYisAwˆ is`Kwˆ dIAwˆ AsMKÎwq sMgqwˆ ijs gurU dIAwˆ hn, gurmuKwˆ nUM suKPl dyx hwry Es qweIˆ bwrMbwr nmskwr hY]193]
